import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import * as AOS from 'aos'; declare var PureCounter: any; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent implements OnInit { ngOnInit(): void { AOS.init(); new PureCounter(); // init counters } }
